articles.author: Annie Lennon
articles.title: How does COVID-19 affect the heart? New clues arise
articles.description: A new study suggests that the heart damage that COVID-19 sometimes causes may occur due to a mechanism involving the spike protein.
articles.content:
• Researchers investigated how SARS-CoV-2 damages heart muscle cells.
  • They found that the virus damages heart muscle cells via an inflammatory pathway independent of ACE2 receptors.
